mapper.update: update application set room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `year` = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, time_begin = #{timeBegin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time_end = #{timeEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_target1 = #{roomTarget1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_target2 = #{roomTarget2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_target3 = #{roomTarget3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{noticeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, media = #{media,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify1 = #{verify1,jdbcType=CHAR}, verify2 = #{verify2,jdbcType=CHAR}, `execute` = #{execute,jdbcType=CHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where application = #{application,jdbcType=INTEGER}
